column4: have any of you heard of a 17.5 x 20.5 cm netbook/laptop?  That's the size of my trenchcoat pocket.
have any of you heard of a 17.5 x 20.5 cm netbook/laptop?  That's the size of my trenchcoat pocket.
I found lots of small laptops by using Google,
to go really small consider the N series Nokia tablet (N900 the latest). Maybe its enough of a laptop to fit your needs and maybe not?
